name: eles.pageRank
descr: Rank the nodes in the collection using the [Page Rank](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PageRank) algorithm.

fields.name: dampingFactor
fields.descr: The [damping factor](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PageRank#Damping_factor), affecting how long the algorithm goes along the topology of the graph (default `0.8`).

fields.name: precision
fields.descr: Numeric parameter that represents the required precision (default `0.000001`).  The algorithm stops when the difference between iterations is this value or less.

fields.name: iterations
fields.descr: Maximum number of iterations to perform (default `200`).
